name: Grudge Match : Street Basketball (Canceled)
blurb: Street basketball w/ attitude; plays like an arcade game; depth of hard science & real rewards.

rewards.reward:
*** Reward Level 5 *** - THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT! 
We appreciate your support! =========================== 
NOTES FOR REWARDS: 
Grudge Match Street will be DRM-free and be available for PC, Mac, Linux, and Ouya.  
Digital documents will be available in PDF, EPUB, MOBI formats (DRM-free). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
All Tiers include access to the Official Grudge Match Street Community & ISN Developer Documentary screening room, where backers can provide input and will be polled on specific game development decisions.

*** Reward Level 20 *** (all digital)\r\n - You get Reward Level 5 rewards + A Digital downloadable copy of GM Street DRM-free for PC, MAC OSX, Linux or Ouya. This low price only available for those who help fund. You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual with a 2 month head start on content creation.  Includes starter source code pack D3.

*** Reward Level 25 *** (all digital) - You'll get Reward Level 20 rewards + an extra month for a total of a 3 month head start on content creation.  This low price only available for those who help fund.

*** Reward Level 28 *** (all digital) - You'll get Reward Level 25 +   You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual and a strategy & tips guide for creating your own content + a 4 month head start on content creation + digital playbook on the Hard Science of street basketball + starter player source code pack.  This low price only available for those who help fund.
*** Reward Level 35 *** (all digital) - You get Reward Level 28 + DRM-Free Digital Soundtrack + Digital Concept Artbook + a 5 month head start on content creation.
*** Reward Level 39 *** (all digital) - You receive Reward Level 28 + digital Indie sports Marketing Playbook by co-founder Bob Lindsey + a 5 month head start on content creation.

*** Reward Level 45 *** (all digital) - Two versions - You get Reward Level 28 + Grudge Match II & the All-Pro 1 Content Pack + starter source code pack Pro1 + 5 month head start.  Note: Grudge Match & All-Pro includes the latest code at the time the All-Pro content has been selected by Backers and ISN Scouts, estimated to be six-nine months after Grudge Match's initial completion date of Dec 2014.
*** Reward Level 50 *** (all digital) - You'll get Reward Level 39 + HiRes digital Concept Art + Digital "World of Street Basketball Comic" + Digital Training Map.
*** Reward Level 75 *** (all digital) - You'll get Reward Level 50 + Beta Test Access + Thanks in Credits  (D2 Level) + Digital Player's Guide
*** Reward Level 80 *** (all digital) - You'll get Reward Level 50 + Grudge Match II & the All-Pro 1 Content Pack + Beta Test Access + Thanks in Credits (D2 Level)

*** Reward Level 95 *** (digital & physical) - D3 Collector - Backer-Only COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOXED COPY which includes Game DVD for PC, MAC OSX, or Linux (box but no CD for Ouya) + Digital downloadable copy of the game + Classic Printed Manual + Printed Concept Art Book + Audio CD Soundtrack + DRM-free digital soundtrack + Digital Concept Art + Digital Game Manual + Digital High Resolution Art + Digital Playbook Compilation + credit (D2) along with the development team + 3 month head start on content creation.
*** Reward Level 1000 *** (digital & physical) - You get Reward Level 525 + Signed Backer-Only Collector's Edition Box +Limited Edition Signed Print.
